## OAuthCredential.accessToken property

The OAuth access token associated with the credential if it belongs to an OAuth provider, such as `facebook.com`<!-- -->, `twitter.com`<!-- -->, etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly accessToken?: string;
```
